data.name: Warside - Digital Edition
data.detailed_description:
Note! You can not purchase this pack twice for your account.

Digital edition includes:



  • X1,5 exp.
  • X2 credits
  • +1 character slot
  • +1 reward per battle
  • +1 inventory page
  • +8 slots on the market
  • +1 battle-kit



  • 100 gold
  • Alpha hood Customization

Gold

Gold is in-game currency used in our premium-shop. There you can find boosters of different kind and duration, customizations and other convenience bonuses.

Customizations

Digital edition contains a unique customization.

  • Alpha hood. Part of the legendary squad uniform, awarded only to a chosen few. Symbol of valor and extraordinary skills.

    Thanks for your interest to Warside! By purchasing Digital edition you help us to continue working on Warside.

data.short_description:
Digital edition includes number of lifetime bonuses (additional exp, credits, rewards and others), small amount of gold for use in premium-shop and unique customization.

Digital edition is a good way to get started in Warside.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium D / Athlon х2 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 Gt / ATI Radeon HD 2600 / Intel GMA 950 (i945G) or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
